text.div:
EncounterSubjectNameSearchParameter

Parameter subject.name:string

Searches for Encounter based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient.name={name}

ResourceEncounter
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesEncounter
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: EncounterSubjectNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for Encounter based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient.name={name}
